subject: Law
title: The Changing Legal Profession
description: A quick win: understand The Changing Legal Profession.

hook.text: AI can now draft contracts, review documents, and predict case outcomes. What does that mean for lawyers?

buildup.text: The legal profession is transforming: technology automates routine tasks that once required junior lawyers.

discovery.text: Legal tech startups offer online dispute resolution, AI-assisted research, and automated document review.

twist.text: Access to justice may improve: AI tools can help people who can't afford lawyers navigate simple legal matters.

climax.text: But ethical questions remain: who is liable when AI gives wrong legal advice? The rules haven't caught up.

punchline.text: Technology changes how law is practiced. It doesn't change why it matters.

quiz.question: How might AI improve access to justice?
options: By helping people who can't afford lawyers with simple legal matters
